rooms.description: North-facing entrance with a vestibule, aligning with Vastu guidelines for auspicious entry.
Open-plan living area combining Scandinavian minimalism and ample natural light.
Compact dining space adjacent to the living room with a view towards the north garden.
Modern Scandinavian kitchen designed for efficiency and functionality.
Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom; positioned towards the north to enhance positive energy.
Additional bedroom for privacy and relaxation.
Guest bathroom designed with Scandinavian aesthetics.
Dedicated home office space optimized for productivity and minimal distraction.
Compact storage room for utilities and home-office equipment.

openings.description: Large north-facing windows enhancing natural light.
North-facing entrance door aligning with Vastu principles for prosperity.
